attributes.action: Reconsider and Impliment and increase of 2.5% to all othe state pensions for the coming year 2010-2011
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The increases proposed at the moment are 2.5% on basic state pension. and 1.5% on Attendance Allowance.   I call on the Prime Minister to apply the 2.5% increase on all other pensions i.e. serps, graduated retirement benifits, attendance allowance, forces pensions, war pensions, and all other pensions and allowances.   It is blatent discrimination not to include these other pensions in the annual increase proposed for 2010/11
